{{codepointer|Spawn|Hexen|r=Korax}} '''A_KoraxBonePop'''
(no parameters)
Shoots six {{Class|KoraxSpirit}} actors with 60Â° angle intervals, initializes them by giving them the calling actor as their <tt>tracer</tt> field, a random number between 32 and 40 as their <tt>special2</tt> field, and sets its <tt>args[0]</tt> field to 10. For each spirit, it also creates a tail made of a {{Class|HolyTail}} that has the spirit as its <tt>target</tt> and the first of three {{Class|HolyTailTrail}} as its <tt>tracer</tt>, and each tail trail having the next in the list as its tracer. A total of 30 actors are therefore spawned: six spirits, six tails, and eighteen trails.
It then starts script number 255 with the calling actor as the activator. In the original [[Hexen]] map when {{Class|Korax}} is fought, this script opens up the door leading to the endgame.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Korax}} and derived classes.
